title: Apple Reports Earnings Today. The Stock Is Going Crazy but Revenue Is Pancake Flat.
text:
Apple in recent weeks has become the most valuable publicly traded business in the world, with a 54% year-to-date gain—a remarkable surge for a company that isn’t growing.

Through Tuesday, the stock price had risen almost $86, a year-to-date market cap increase of $387 billion to about $1.1 trillion. Other than Apple (ticker: AAPL) itself, there are only six companies on Earth with a market cap greater than $400 billion; the surge is greater than the market cap of Walmart (WMT), the world’s largest private employer.

...
description: Apple in recent weeks has become the most valuable publicly traded business in the world. The stock’s surge is remarkable for a company that isn’t growing.
